author: admin
title: MP Vyapam Recruitment 2017 (714 Female Paryavekshak/Supervisor) Vacancy
text: Bega, Sahariya and bhariya, Specific SC candidates NIL Salary Structure : Candidates who will be appointed for this job opening they will be get the salary of Rs. 5200-20200 along with Grade pay Rs. 2400/- per month. Selection Process : Selecrion of the eligible and skilled candidates will be made on the basis of candidate’s performance in written examination organized by the recruitment team of Madhya Pradesh Professional Examination Board. Want to Know? Tips to Prepare for Written Exam Process To Fill MP Vyapam Application Form : First of all, candidates must have to visit the official website of Madhya Pradesh Professional Examination Board i.e. www.vyapam.nic.in Press on “Rulebook” option given with “Online Form – Directorate of Akikrit Bal Vikas Seva Recruitment Test 2017 (for Mahila Paryavekshak and Paryavekshak Mahila Aganwadi Karyakarta)” option. Read the complete opened notification and then hit on “Online Form – Directorate of Akikrit Bal Vikas Seva Recruitment Test 2017 (for Mahila Paryavekshak and Paryavekshak Mahila Aganwadi Karyakarta)” link. Read all the instruction very carefully and then hit on “Apply” button. Fill the registration form with complete information. After successful registration, Fill Online Application Form with complete details, and make the payment of application fee. Upload the required documents in proper manner and hit on “Submit” button. Candidates must take a hard copy of duly filled form for future use.
